name: Connect the Dots - Dinosaurs
description: Translated to English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Hindi and German.  This game is designed for the little ones in the house to entertain themselves by connect the dots and discovering the dinosaurs that are hidden behind the puzzle.  The game of connect the dots is easy, through numbers and connecting the dots in ascending order, you will find out which dinosaur hides behind the puzzle and will emit its dinosaur sound.  The dinosaurs that we can find after connecting the points are: - Tyrannosaurus; also known as T-Rex. - Plesiosaurus; an aquatic dinosaur. - Stenonychosaurus; By connecting the dots of this dinosaur you will be surprised by its sound. - Pteranodon; a flying dinosaur. - Ankylosaurus, brachiosaurus, ichthyosaurus, velociraptor, brontosaurus, tylosaurus, oviraptor, stegosaurus, triceratops, microraptor, spinosaurus ... and many more!  In addition, when connecting the dinosaur points, the sound made by the animal will be emitted.  And thats not all! An information button is discovered that takes you directly to the dinosaur information.  This game is full of color, and thanks to the practice and dedication of our developers, you will get the child to pay attention and learn in an interactive and useful way.  Connect the Dots - Dinosaurs ----------------------------------------------- In future updates will be including more dinosaurs.
